duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist orthopedic physicians in the operating room and evaluate new patients with work-up and interpretation of diagnostic studies
Relay results and treatment plans to patients, counsel patients and their families regarding proposed surgical procedures, and address pre-and post-operative patient questions and concerns
Close interaction with patients and families, demonstrating excellent teamwork, communication, and interpersonal skills

education_certification.credential: Graduation from an accredited PA program, FL licensure, BLS/ACLS certification, NCCPA board certification, Trauma experience, Infection Control Certification, Child Abuse Recognition, and excellent communication and interpersonal skills
